name: Across Enemy Mines
description:
Note: STILL IN DEVELOPMENT. We appreciate your interest, we're pretty excited about the game too. But please keep that in mind if you encounter a world-ending bug, or even a small one. Thanks!

"Seems impressive" - Chris, our Mom

"Rad" - Jack, 9

Blast your friends out of the mines in this fast-paced local 2-4 player PvP action game! Featuring 2 main modes, Versus and Destroy The Dirt , play on game pads for endless mining fun!

  • In Destroy The Dirt, instead of attacking your friends, just destroy more dirt blocks than the other player!
  • In Versus, Blow the other player up with bombs before he can get to you!

Gamepads required to play!
